items.name: Inevitability
explicitMods: With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Magma Orb fires an additional Projectile

With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Magma Orb
has 10% increased Area of Effect per Chain
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Izaro gave rise to Chitus.
Chitus gave rise to Voll.
None could know how it would end.
None could stop it.

items.name: Volley Fire
explicitMods: With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Barrage fires an additional 2 projectiles simultaneously on the first and final attacks
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Lioneye's men stood at the walls,
eyeing the savages that walked the beach below.
With a single word,
a thousand bodies, and ten thousand arrows,
would litter the sands.

items.descrText: Right-click to add this prophecy to your character.
flavourText: The Unbreathing Queen masterminds an unholy heist, a defilement of the dead.
items.prophecyText: You will encounter spectres in the Fellshrine Ruins, Cemetery Map, or Graveyard Map and slay them.

items.name: Malicious Intent
explicitMods: 5% chance to Gain Unholy Might for 4 seconds on Melee Kill
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Each life taken makes the next a little easier.

items.name: Rapid Expansion
explicitMods:
With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Ground Slam has a 35% chance
to grant an Endurance Charge when you Stun an Enemy

With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Ground Slam
has a 50% increased angle
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Chitus began to aggressively expand his empire
into neighbouring nations at great human cost.
But for absolute power, there is no price
that a Perandus won't pay.

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Omen on the Winds
explicitMods: 18% increased Damage with Hits against Chilled Enemies
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Ice Shot has 25% increased Area of Effect
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Ice Shot Pierces 3 additional Targets
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: As Malachai stepped into the Highgate mines,
cold winds billowed from the mountain above.
One final, feeble attempt to save what was meant to be eternal.

items.descrText: Right-click to add this prophecy to your character.
flavourText: The Plaguemaw enters the red realm and leaves a swirling mass of living stone.
items.prophecyText: You will encounter a powerful golem in a Vaal side area and defeat it.

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

flavourText: Exposure led to the deaths of many slaves.
And it was the duty of slaves to bury the dead in the frozen ground.
A growing circle of misery and death
that the elite were all too happy to sustain.

With 40 total Intelligence and Dexterity in Radius, Elemental Hit cannot choose Fire
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Voll stood at the gates of Sarn, and a nation stood behind him.
He thought of the righteousness of his cause,
and of the glory he would bring to the empire he would soon lead.
But as Chitus and his gemlings advanced, he thought only of the fight.

items.name: String of Servitude
flavourText: For the Vaal, the relationship between slave and master
was as intimate and volatile as that of lovers.

explicitMods: 100% increased Rarity of Items found when on Low Life

flavourText: News of Kaom's victory in the south spread quickly.
Those in support of the coming rebellion bided their time.
The rest fled like rats from a fire.

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: A mage from the coast rode up on a broken nag, legs burnt to his bones.
Before he collapsed, he uttered:
"I watched the world we know end yesterday."

With her tribe, devoted and strong.
And sewed shut the mouth of nightmare,
So that it would not consume her world.

Through the first snows of winter,
When beasts have gorged their fill,
And see nothing but the long slumber ahead.

We travel to fulfill.

flavourText: Maligaro understood that devotion to science,
Means devotion to trial and error.
For Maligaro's errors, death was slow,
And very painful.
